TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ExceptionHandlingClauseOptions extends System.Enum

remarks.format: ## Remarks Per esaminare le clausole di gestione delle eccezioni in un metodo, ottenere un oggetto e chiamare il per ottenere il corpo del metodo.To examine the exception-handling clauses in a method, obtain a object and call the method to obtain the method body. Utilizzare il proprietà per ottenere un elenco di oggetti.Use the property to obtain a list of objects. > [!NOTE] > Per utilizzare le clausole di gestione delle eccezioni richiede una conoscenza approfondita dei metadati e i formati di istruzioni Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL).Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. Informazioni disponibili nella documentazione di Common Language Infrastructure (CLI), in particolare "Partition II: metadati definizione e la semantica" e "Partizione III: CIL Instruction Set".Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". La documentazione è disponibile online; vedere [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) (ECMA C# e standard di Common Language Infrastructure) in MSDN e [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) nel sito Web internazionale Ecma.The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples Esempio di codice seguente definisce un metodo di test denominato `MethodBodyExample`e vengono visualizzate le informazioni sulle variabili locali e clausole di gestione delle eccezioni.The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. Il metodo viene utilizzato per ottenere un oggetto per il metodo di test.The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. Il proprietà viene utilizzata per ottenere un elenco di degli oggetti e per visualizzarne le proprietà.The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > Non tutti i linguaggi di programmazione è possibile generare clausole di filtro.Not all computer languages can generate Filter clauses. Nell'esempio di Visual Basic viene illustrata una clausola di filtro, utilizzando un Visual Basic `When` espressione, che viene omesso dagli esempi per le altre lingue.The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. Questo codice è parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per la classe.This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClauseOptions Clause = int32(0)

summary.span: The clause accepts all exceptions that derive from a specified type.

span.span: The clause accepts all exceptions that derive from a specified type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClauseOptions Fault = int32(4)

summary.span: The clause is executed if an exception occurs, but not on completion of normal control flow.

span.span: The clause is executed if an exception occurs, but not on completion of normal control flow.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClauseOptions Filter = int32(1)

summary.span: The clause contains user-specified instructions that determine whether the exception should be ignored (that is, whether normal execution should resume), be handled by the associated handler, or be passed on to the next clause.

span.span: The clause contains user-specified instructions that determine whether the exception should be ignored (that is, whether normal execution should resume), be handled by the associated handler, or be passed on to the next clause.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClauseOptions Finally = int32(2)

summary.span: The clause is executed whenever the try block exits, whether through normal control flow or because of an unhandled exception.

span.span: The clause is executed whenever the try block exits, whether through normal control flow or because of an unhandled exception.
